PDF Unlock Tool

Remove password protection from a PDF file. Upload your locked PDF, enter the password, and download an unlocked copy — all processed locally in your browser.

Runs locally — no uploads. Your PDF and password never leave your device.

Unlocking PDF...

How the PDF Unlock tool works

This tool uses the pdf-lib library, running entirely in your browser, to open your password-protected PDF with the password you provide. It then saves a new copy with no password protection. Your PDF file and your password are never sent to any server — everything happens locally on your device.

When to use this tool

Use this tool when you have a PDF you own and know the password for, but want to remove the password requirement for easier access. This tool will not bypass or guess unknown passwords — you must provide the correct password yourself.
